Review Text:
Viewnya sangat indah... disini kita bisa melihat keindahan danau dan bukit savana...
Surganya para landskepper.. terutama saat sunset. ditempat ini juga bisa bermain olahraga uji nyali pralayang😁.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: One of the best place to catch sunset in Jayapura. Beautiful landscapes and not so far from the Jayapura city. Recommended place to enjoy your day. Also a place to take your selfie.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: it was so green. I love the view. we could see some cows here. don't forget to wear sneakers to come and climb the hills
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: Tidak salah orang menyebut bukit teletubies, krn memang pemandangan yang mirip pada film anak2 tsb, tempat ini menjadi salah satu tujuan wisata jika anda berkunjung ke Jayapura, Anda akan menyaksikan hamparan padang rumput yang luas
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Title: bukit hijau dengan pemandangan danau sentani
Review Text: di atas bukit terdapat pondok-pondok yang memanjakan mata dengan latar belakang pemandangan danau sentani yang indah. berkunjunglah saat pagi atau sore hari untuk menikmati sunrise atau sunset. saat saat tertentu tempat ini digunakan untuk berlatih paralayang.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: tanjakan tidak terlalu tinggi, dan sangat mudah dijangkau, tapi pemandangan yang dilihat sangat indah, jangan lupa tunggu sunset lho kalua pas ke sini
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Title: Climb the hill for great sunset
Review Text: The location was around 1,5 hour from Jayapura. From the parking area we must climb a quite steep hill but still easy enough to climb. It is about 5-10 minutes to climb. From the top the view was really amazing. I could see the Sentani Lake and the hills that create a beautiful painting. Sunset behind the hills was really amazing. There was a cross on the top that could be a nice object for photograph.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

Review Text: It s best at sunset. a short hike of a small hill and you ll reward yourself with a 360 view of the whole Sentani lake. It s worth paying a visit.
Disclaimer: This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
